mapper.sql: user_id AS userId, user_login_id AS userLoginId, user_email AS userEmail, user_password AS userPassword, user_name AS userName, user_profile_image AS userProfileImage, user_status AS userStatus, user_birthday AS userBirthday, rank_id AS rankId, dept_id AS deptId, user_created_at AS userCreatedAt, user_updated_at AS userUpdatedAt, remember_token AS rememberToken, remember_token_expired AS rememberTokenExpired
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, user_login_id AS userLoginId, user_password AS userPassword, user_status AS userStatus, user_name AS userName, user_profile_image AS userProfileImage FROM User WHERE user_login_id = #{loginId}

SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_login_id AS userLoginId, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_status AS userStatus, u.dept_id AS deptId, u.rank_id AS rankId, d.dept_name AS deptName, r.rank_name AS rankName FROM User u JOIN Dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN Ranks r ON u.rank_id = r.rank_id ORDER BY u.user_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User ( user_login_id, user_email, user_password, user_name, user_profile_image, user_status, user_birthday, rank_id, dept_id ) VALUES ( #{userLoginId}, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userProfileImage}, #{userStatus}, #{userBirthday}, #{rankId}, #{deptId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET remember_token = NULL, remember_token_expired = NULL WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE User SET user_email = #{userEmail}, user_name = #{userName}, user_status = #{userStatus}, rank_id = #{rankId}, dept_id = #{deptId} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
